FuncDef:
The port-mirroring to command configures an observing port for interface-based flow mirroring.
The undo port-mirroring to command cancels an observing port for interface-based flow mirroring.
By default, no observing port is configured for interface-based flow mirroring.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the index of an observing port.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 255.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure an observing port for interface-based flow mirroring, run the port-mirroring to command. Only the traffic matching the traffic policy is sent to the specified observing port.
Prerequisites
Flow mirroring has been configured in the traffic behavior view using the port-mirroring enable command.
